data.comment: The match is underway in Kalmar.
Sirius awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 1, Fredrik Klitte signals a free kick to Sirius in their own half.
Fredrik Klitte awards the home team a throw-in.
Free kick for Kalmar in the half of Sirius.
In the minute 4, Throw-in Sirius.
Kalmar have a goal kick.
Ball safe as Kalmar is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 7, Free kick for Sirius in their own half.
Sirius awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Kalmar Sirius attack through Stefano Vecchia. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 8, Fredrik Klitte awards Kalmar a goal kick.
Play has been temporarily suspended for attention to Emin Nouri for Kalmar who is writhing in pain on the pitch.
Throw-in for Kalmar in their own half.
In the minute 10, Alexander Ahl Holmstrom (Kalmar) has replaced the possibly injured Emin Nouri at Guldfageln Arena.
Sirius awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Sirius in their own half.
In the minute 12, Fredrik Klitte signals a free kick to Sirius in their own half.
Kalmar's Filip Sachpekidis gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Sirius goal kick.
In the minute 13, Throw-in for Kalmar at Guldfageln Arena.
Kalmar awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fredrik Klitte signals a Sirius throw-in in Kalmar's half.
In the minute 15, Fredrik Klitte signals a free kick to Sirius in their own half.
Svante Ingelsson gets his shot on target but fails to score for Kalmar.
Yukiya Sugita for Sirius gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 18, Goal kick for Kalmar at Guldfageln Arena.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Kalmar.
Free kick for Sirius in their own half.
In the minute 22, Sirius's Axel Bjornstrom gets in a shot on goal at Guldfageln Arena. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Sirius drive upfield and Yukiya Sugita gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Kalmar defender.
Can Sirius capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kalmar's half?
In the minute 23, Throw-in for Kalmar in their own half.
Throw-in Sirius.
Sirius awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 25, Free kick for Kalmar in their own half.
Corner awarded to Sirius.
Kalmar's Alexander Ahl Holmstrom gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Sirius defender.
In the minute 28, Fredrik Klitte signals a free kick to Sirius in their own half.
Sirius's Stefano Vecchia is on target but unsuccessful.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 29, Free kick Sirius.
Throw-in for Kalmar in the half of Sirius.
Fredrik Klitte awards Sirius a goal kick.
In the minute 31, Sirius awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Kalmar a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Sirius have a dangerous throw-in.
In the minute 33, Fredrik Klitte awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Sirius at Guldfageln Arena.
Ball safe as Kalmar is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 35, Fredrik Klitte signals a free kick to Kalmar.
Sirius to take a throw-in in Kalmar territory.
Can Sirius get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kalmar's half?
In the minute 39, Kalmar awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in Sirius.
Fredrik Klitte signals a Sirius throw-in in Kalmar's half.
In the minute 40, Kalmar are coming forward and Filip Sachpekidis gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Sirius have a goal kick.
Sirius advance rapidly upfield but Fredrik Klitte blows for offside.
In the minute 42, Free kick for Sirius in their own half.
Fredrik Klitte awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Sirius at Guldfageln Arena.
In the minute 44, Fredrik Klitte signals a free kick to Kalmar in their own half.
Ball safe as Kalmar is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Kalmar awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 45, Kalmar have been awarded a corner by Fredrik Klitte.
Throw-in for Sirius close to the penalty box.
1 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Kalmar will need to be alert as they defend a dangerous free kick from Sirius.
Axel Bjornstrom (Sirius) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
The first-half is over.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
In the minute 46, Can Sirius get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Kalmar's half?
Nanne Bergstrand (Kalmar) is making a second substitution, with Isak Jansson replacing Rafinha.
Nanne Bergstrand is making the team's third substitution at Guldfageln Arena with Carl Gustafsson replacing Filip Sachpekidis.
Kalmar's York Raphael breaks free at Guldfageln Arena. But the strike goes wide of the post.
Goal kick for Sirius at Guldfageln Arena.
In the minute 49, Sirius take a 0-1 lead thanks to Yukiya Sugita.
Great play from Stefano Vecchia to set up the goal.
Free kick Kalmar.
In the minute 51, Sirius needs to be cautious. Kalmar have an attacking throw-in.
Fredrik Klitte signals a free kick to Sirius in their own half.
At Guldfageln Arena, Sebastian Ring has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 54, Free kick for Kalmar in their own half.
Sirius awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Corner awarded to Sirius.
In the minute 56, Important block from the Kalmar defence as Mohammed Saeid fires in a strike for Sirius.
Fredrik Klitte signals a throw-in for Sirius, close to Kalmar's area.
Ball goes out of play for a Kalmar goal kick.
In the minute 57, Throw-in high up the field for Sirius in Kalmar.
Throw-in for Sirius close to the penalty box.
Throw-in for Kalmar in their own half.
In the minute 58, Sirius to take a throw-in in Kalmar territory.
In Kalmar Sirius drive forward through Stefano Vecchia. His shot is on target but it's saved.
Romarinho (Kalmar) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
In the minute 60, Kalmar have been awarded a corner by Fredrik Klitte.
Corner awarded to Kalmar.
In the minute 62, Kalmar have been awarded a corner by Fredrik Klitte.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
The home team replace York Raphael with Edvin Crona.
Throw-in Sirius.
In the minute 63, It's a goal kick for the away team in Kalmar.
Can Sirius capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Kalmar's half?
In Kalmar, Sirius push forward quickly but are pulled up for offside.
In the minute 67, Edvin Crona for Kalmar drives towards goal at Guldfageln Arena. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Fredrik Klitte signals a free kick to Kalmar.
Ball safe as Sirius is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 70, Attention is being given to Kalmar’s Romarinho and play has been suspended briefly.
Throw-in for Kalmar in the half of Sirius.
Kalmar's Isak Jansson gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 72, Sirius have a goal kick.
Kalmar's Romarinho is back in action after a slight knock.
In Kalmar a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 74, Kalmar have been awarded a corner by Fredrik Klitte.
Free kick for Sirius in the half of Kalmar.
In Kalmar Sirius drive forward through Yukiya Sugita. His shot is on target but it's saved.
In the minute 77, Sirius push upfield but Fredrik Klitte quickly pulls them for offside.
At Guldfageln Arena, Kalmar are penalized for being offside.
The match at Guldfageln Arena has been interrupted briefly for a check on Mohammed Saeid, who is down injured.
In the minute 80, Throw-in for Sirius at Guldfageln Arena.
Fredrik Klitte signals a Kalmar throw-in in Sirius's half.
In Kalmar a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 81, Goal! The home team draw level at 1-1 through Svante Ingelsson.
Fidan Aliti with an assist there.
Corner awarded to Sirius.
In the minute 82, Fredrik Klitte signals a throw-in for Kalmar, close to Sirius's area.
Kalmar have a dangerous throw-in.
Mohammed Saeid has recovered and rejoins the match in Kalmar.
In the minute 84, Fidan Aliti (Kalmar) strikes at Guldfageln Arena but his header is cleared.
Free kick for Sirius in their own half.
Svante Ingelsson (Kalmar) has received a first yellow card.
In the minute 84, The away team have replaced Hjalmar Ekdal with Jamie Roche. This is the first substitution made today by Henrik Rydstrom.
Fredrik Klitte signals a free kick to Sirius in their own half.
Kalmar awarded a free kick in their own half.
Fredrik Klitte signals a free kick to Sirius in their own half.
In the minute 86, Mohammed Saeid (Sirius) gets a yellow card.
Throw-in high up the field for Sirius in Kalmar.
In the minute 87, Kalmar awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Free kick for Sirius in the half of Kalmar.
In the minute 88, It's a goal kick for the home team in Kalmar.
Fidan Aliti is booked for the home team.
Sirius awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Sirius in their own half.
Fredrik Klitte awards the home team a throw-in.
4 minutes of injury time will be added to the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Kalmar at Guldfageln Arena.
Kalmar to take a throw-in in Sirius territory.
Ball goes out of play for a Sirius goal kick.
Corner awarded to Kalmar.
Sirius needs to be cautious. Kalmar have an attacking throw-in.
Goal kick for Sirius at Guldfageln Arena.
The match is over. Final score 1-1.
Mohammed Saeid (Sirius) does not seem to be able to continue. He is replaced by Joakim Persson.
Johan Karlsson is replacing Nahom Girmai for the away team.
Sirius's Lukas Jonsson has been booked in Kalmar.
